summary: Build a marketing/landing website for ASHA PF CONSULTANCY (EPF/EPS consultancy) with hero, services, CTA, and contact form sections (remove the Process section).
architectural_notes: Static responsive marketing site; Tailwind CSS via CDN as initial styling approach.
Single-page layout with anchor navigation to #services and #contact.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Professional wordmark logo with a simple icon, indigo/blue palette, text “ASHA PF CONSULTANCY” (asha-pf-logo.dim_1200x300.png)
- Simplified icon-only mark that matches the logo style (asha-pf-icon.dim_256x256.png)
- Minimal favicon version of the icon mark with transparent background (asha-pf-favicon.dim_64x64.png)

existing_features.title: Implement a responsive single-page marketing website for “ASHA PF CONSULTANCY | EPF & EPS Experts” with in-page anchor navigation and the following sections in this order: Hero (headline, subheadline, two CTAs linking to #contact and #services, and a short bullet list), Why Choose Us (3 feature cards: Expert Handling, Transparent Fees, PAN India Support), Services (6 service cards), Process (4 step cards), CTA band (headline, short copy, button linking to #contact), Contact section (form), and Footer (copyright “© 2026 ASHA PF CONSULTANCY. All rights reserved.” + disclaimer text). All user-facing text must be in English and match the provided content.

Create and apply a consistent visual theme for the site that fits a professional consultancy brand and aligns with the provided Tailwind styling direction (clean, high-contrast, modern). Define consistent typography scale, spacing, card styling, and a primary accent color family (indigo/blue as in the provided HTML), and use it across all sections.

Make the Contact form functional in the React app with client-side validation and a clear submission UX. Fields: Name (required), Mobile Number (required), UAN (optional), Describe your PF issue (required). On submit, show loading state, then show a success confirmation and clear the form. Do not navigate away from the page.

Wire the frontend Contact form submission to the backend method using the existing actor integration pattern and React Query for mutation management (loading/error/success). Display a user-friendly error message if the backend rejects the submission.
Remove references to example PF form names/numbers (e.g., “Form 31”, “Form 13”) from all user-facing website content, while keeping the meaning of the services intact.
Remove the entire “Process / Our Simple Process” section from the landing page so it is no longer rendered anywhere on the site.
Add a credibility/statistic line with the exact text “Helped more than 1000 individuals” in the hero area, styled to fit the existing design, and ensure it is visible on mobile and desktop.
Add a professional “ASHA PF CONSULTANCY” logo to the site using generated static image assets, and integrate it into the hero (near the main heading) and as the site favicon.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create ASHA PF CONSULTANCY landing website (responsive Tailwind page) with sections: Hero, Why Choose Us, Services, Process, CTA, Contact form, and Footer with disclaimer.

Add backend support to receive and persist contact submissions. Store submissions in stable canister state with timestamp and the submitted fields (name, mobile, uan optional, message). Expose a backend method to create a submission that the frontend can call.
Remove references to example PF form names (e.g., Form 31, Form 13) from the website content.
Remove the "Process / Our Simple Process" section from the landing page.
Add a professional logo for "ASHA PF CONSULTANCY" and integrate it into the site (e.g., header/hero and favicon as appropriate).
Add a credibility/statistic line: "Helped more than 1000 individuals" (placement to fit the landing page layout, e.g., hero or trust bar).
